title: Delhi HC stays DRI proceedings against Hero Group chairman Pawan Munjal
description: The Delhi High Court has stayed proceedings against Hero Motocorp Chairman Pawan Kant Munjal by the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI). The court noted that Munjal had been exonerated by the Customs, Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal (CESTAT) on the same set of facts, which was not disclosed before the trial court.
